name: Binded
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 where the theme was Joined together. This was the first game I have ever published and am most proud of it. This game contains many bugs.

How to Play;

Use WASD w-left d-right w-jump space-shoot

Defeat the aliens and try to survive as long as you can will an ever-increasing spawn rate. Also, dodge your own bullets as they can hurt you.
